titleInfo.title: Ohio and Vicinity Regional Council of Carpenters et al v. G.E. Maier Co. et al
titleInfo.subTitle: Memorandum of Opinion granting in part and denying in part motion to dismiss. The motion is granted with respect to the Council's claims asserted against G.E.; however, the motion is denied with respect to claims asserted against Gemco. Furthermore, the motion is denied with respect to the Funds' claims (Related Doc # 3). Signed by Judge Ann Aldrich on 1-19-07.(K,V)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 1:06-cv-01871; Ohio and Vicinity Regional Council of Carpenters et al v. G.E. Maier Co. et al;
extension.courtName: United States District Court Northern District of Ohio
extension.docketText: Memorandum of Opinion granting in part and denying in part motion to dismiss. The motion is granted with respect to the Council's claims asserted against G.E.; however, the motion is denied with respect to claims asserted against Gemco. Furthermore, the motion is denied with respect to the Funds' claims (Related Doc # 3). Signed by Judge Ann Aldrich on 1-19-07.(K,V)
